# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="be253-102">Legge til flagg og påminnelser i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be253-103">Slik angir eller redigerer du en påminnelse for en hendelse:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="be253-104">Gå til [Kalender](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="be253-105">Velg hendelsen du vil bli påminnet om, og velg deretter pilene øverst i høyre hjørne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="be253-106">for å utvide den.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="be253-107">Velg et påminnelses tidspunkt ved siden av **påminning**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="be253-108">Outlook.com lagrer endringene automatisk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="be253-109">Hvis du vil minne deg selv om å følge opp en melding, kan du legge til et oppfølgings flagg:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="be253-110">Gå til [e-post](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="be253-111">Hold pekeren over meldingen i meldings listen for å se flagg-alternativet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="be253-112">Velg flagg ikonet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="be253-113">for å flagge meldingen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="be253-114">Hvis du vil se alle flaggede meldinger, merker du av for Merk nederst til venstre på siden for å gå til aktiviteter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="be253-115">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du lese [flagg eller feste en melding i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="be253-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
